Name: Coordinator of Worlds
Details: The head of the state of the Draconis Combine, the Coordinator of Worlds holds near absolute power and is the commander in chief of its military, the DCMS. The position has been almost always held by a member of House Kurita since the formation of the Combine and is essentially a dictatorship, an each Coordinator is free to exercise their power more or less directly. The current Coordinator is Takashi Kurita, who succeeded his father Hohiro after he was murdered by one of his guards.
